flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=28>>28 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 28 bags = <<48-28=20>>20 bags for $22 each
20 bags were sold for 20 bags x $22/bag = $<<20*22=440>>440
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $440 = $<<306+250+440=996>>996
The salesman made $996 - $576 = $<<996-576=420>>420 in profit.
#### 420

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 28. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
